name: Adrenaline
text: Any Spent Unit or Group may take any one Action at 0AP Cost.

name: Command Action
text: Any Unit or Group may take any one Action at 0AP Cost.

name: Follow Me!
text: Automatically rally a Unit, even if in a Hex with an enemy Unit or if the Hit Marker has a ‘No Rally’ condition. ‘Destroyed’ Hit Markers with an ‘XX’ marking can NEVER be rallied.

name: Rally Up!
text: Any Unit or Group may roll to attempt to rally. Each attempt must be rolled separately.

name: Rapid Deployment
text: After taking a full normal Move Action, the Unit may move an extra Hex into any passable terrain at no added AP Cost. The Unit then makes a Spent Check.

name: Battlefield Confusion
text: During your Opponent’s Turn, add a 3AP Penalty to their Unit’s Action Cost. The opponent may then still spend CAPs to reduce the Action Cost.

name: Veteran NCO
text: Re-roll any one of your die. This can be done after rolling a d10, d6, or 2d6.

name: Frontline Officer
text: Roll 1D6 for additional CAPs and add them to the CAPs Track. These CAPs are added one time only and the CAP total may now be temporarily higher than the number of CAPs the Mission began with.

name: Seek Cover
text: A Hasty Defense marker(s) may be placed on any Fresh or Spent Unit or Group (including vehicles). May not be placed on a Unit in Close Combat.

name: Sniper Fire
text: Opponent loses 1d6 CAPs immediately for this Round only: 1 = 0 CAPs 2–3 = 1 CAP 4–5 = 2 CAPs 6 = 3 CAPs

name: Careful Aiming
text: Increases a Unit’s Firepower by 2. This card may also increase a Group Attack by 2AR.

name: Swift Action
text: Take 2 consecutive Turns, skipping the opponent’s Turn. Turn Actions may be taken by different Units. The 1st Action does not stress the 2nd Action, since both happen in the same Turn.

name: Luck!
text: A player may attempt to modify their own die roll result. This card may be played after the die roll has been made.
